item.title: Publications
item.description: All our publications are published under open licenses. If you are unable to locate a copy, please contact us and we will be happy to send it to you. 2022 Meeus S, Addink W, Agosti D, Arvanitidis C, Balech B, Dillen M, Dimitrova M, Gonz√°lez-Aranda JM, Holetschek J, Islam S, Jeppesen TS, Mietchen D, Nicolson N, Penev L, Robertson T, Ruch P, Trekels M, Groom Q (2022) Recommendations for interoperability among infrastructures.
